description: Publications released today are not books, they are Granths which will leave a mark in history: PM Museum at Rashtrapati Bhavan a great attempt to bring the past back to life: PM The contribution of
caption: nm-4.com
message:
Glad to join the programme to inaugurate the Phase-2 of the Rashtrapati Bhavan Museum. 

The museum beautifully brings the past back to life. The books inaugurated today are Granths that will leave a distinct mark on history. Congratulated President Mukherjee on completing 4 years in office & highlighted his rich contribution to the nation & the Presidency. http://nm-4.com/poft
